snippet.title: Guild Wars 2 is live on Steam!
snippet.description:
The game that redefined MMORPGs is now available on Steam! Join a friendly community of over 16 million players. Choose from an arsenal of professions, weapons, and playstyles to explore a vast open world, compete in two PVP game modes, and team up for dungeon runs. Base game is available for free, with more content to discover through three expansion packs and five seasons of Living World.

Join us today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1284210/Guild_Wars_2/
